member.name: T:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog
member.summary: A logger implementation based on NLog.

member.name: P:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.SimpleLayout
member.summary: Gets the simple layout.

member.name: P:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.Console
member.summary: Gets the console target.

member.name: P:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.MemoryTarget
member.summary: Gets the memory target - this should only be used for debugging purposes.

member.name: M:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.Register
member.summary: Registers this logger.

member.name: M:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.ResetConfig(NLog.Config.LoggingConfiguration)
member.summary: Resets the configuration.

member.name: M:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.BasicConfig
member.summary: A simple configuration for "basic" setups - mostly testing.

member.name: M:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.#ctor(NLog.ILogger)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.ChangeConfiguration
member.summary: Changes the configuration.

member.name: P:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.IsDebugEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance severity for debug is enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is debug enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.IsInfoEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance severity for info is enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is information enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.IsWarnEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance severity for warning is enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is warn enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.IsErrorEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance severity for error is enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is error enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:com.espertech.esper.compat.logger.LoggerNLog.IsFatalEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance severity for fatal is enabled.
member.value: true if this instance is fatal enabled; otherwise, false.
